NegativeSyntaxTest.purpose: Test that non-safe formulas are not accepted.
NegativeSyntaxTest.description: The variables <tt>?x</tt> and <tt>?z</tt> are unbound in the first disjunct of the condition, and <tt>(u,u)</tt> is not a valid binding pattern for <tt>pred:iri-string</tt>.

InputDocument.Presentation: Document( Prefix(ex <http://example.org/example#>) Prefix(pred <http://www.w3.org/2007/rif-builtin-predicate#>) Group( Forall ?x ?y ?z (ex:p() :- Or( External(pred:iri-string(?x ?z)) And( ex:q(?x) ex:r(?z)))) ) )
